normalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink and You'll Miss These Amazing Deals!

unnormalised: Hey everyone, are you ready for some serious savings, the kinda deals that make your wallet sing a happy tune? Then get ready to dive into the world of flash sales! Think of them as a rapid-fire round of discounts that pop up like Diwali lights – bright, exciting, and gone in a flash!

unnormalised: So, what exactly IS a flash sale? Well, it's a limited-time offer, usually lasting just a few hours or maybe a day or two, on a specific product or a range of items. Retailers like Myntra and Ajio run these all the time. Remember that gorgeous saree your mom, Priya aunty, wanted from Banaras? Keep an eye out for flash sales, you might snag it for a steal!

unnormalised: The beauty of flash sales lies in their urgency. The fear of missing out (FOMO, you know!) really kicks in, pushing you to make a quick decision. Brands use them to clear out old inventory, introduce new products, or just boost sales during a slow period. You might find awesome deals on everything from kurtis to kitchen appliances, even electronics. Imagine getting that new Redmi phone you've been eyeing for 20% off!
